data.text: Yahweh, people should praise only you [MTY];
It is not right that [RHQ] other people-groups should say about us,
But their idols are only statues made of silver and gold,
Their idols have mouths, but they cannot say anything;
They have ears, but they cannot hear anything;
They have hands, but they cannot feel anything;
The people who make those idols are as powerless as those idols,
You, my fellow Israeli people, trust in Yahweh!
All you who revere Yahweh, trust in him!
and he will bless all those who revere him;
I desire that Yahweh will give many children
I desire that Yahweh, the one who made heaven and the earth, will bless all of you!
The highest heavens belong to Yahweh,
Dead people are not able to praise Yahweh;
But we who are alive will thank/praise him,
